EmailTemplate.name: TCS Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: WIN ITUNES AND NANDOS VOUCHERS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WIN PRIZES AND GET REWARDS!!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
We are running a survey to find out what you're up to since graduating from the summer programme so we can celebrate and reward all the great stuff you are doing through certificates, exclusive events and more!
The survey only takes a couple of minutes and the first 50 to fill it in will be entered into a prize draw to win Â£20 in your choice of Nandos or i-Tunes vouchers!
Click here to take survey
Good luck!!!! The Challenge BRIC City Team
WWW.THECHALLENGESOCIETY.ORG
